attributes.action: Immediately SCRAP the daylight savings bill
attributes.additional_details:
I petition the government to immediately scrap the proposed changes to GMT, known in the press as "Berlin Time".

We are giving too much of our country, laws and proceedures over to the EU as it is.  Leave GMT alone.

Latitude and longitude is set by GMT, all time zones work from GMT and the worlds most accurate clock, the atomic clock is set to GMT.

We want "Berlin Time" scrapped immediately and we want the government to leave our precious GMT alone.
